divs: sighting detailsi spotted a bright star-like object heading east just after stepping outside on the back deck. i noticed it was escorted or observed by what appeared to be an aircraft bearing regular navigational lights, some distance from it. witnesses were present. a clip from the recording of the event will be provided but with the sound removed protecting witness(s). i also want to note that i've noticed recent activity that raises suspicion i'm being watched or followed. whenever i leave out of town or somewhere regular, there are vehicles strategically idle and somewhat hidden on the side and begin to start driving some seconds as soon as i pass them. i have been told i'm being watched but i don't know who they are, with only some speculation. are they mufon investigators and\or are the local air force personnel keeping track of me?
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Moose Jaw
There were no other sightings in Moose Jaw on or around April 24th 1989
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Bright Star-like object heading East, escorted by Aircraft
